title: Correction: Prevalence of prediabetes and type 2 diabetes mellitus in south and southeast Asian women with history of gestational diabetes mellitus: Systematic review and meta-analysis
content: by Chockalingam Shivashri, Wesley Hannah, Mohan Deepa, Yonas Ghebremichael-Weldeselassie, Ranjit Mohan Anjana, Ram Uma, Viswanathan Mohan, Ponnusamy Saravanan
